Starstorm:

starstorm had left the chamber before when she heard the noyse 
coming from NightViper's, she opened the door and looking to 
NightViper said "Are you all right? don't tell me that you're afraid 
of close places?"





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> NightViper lay quite in the chamber... He smiled and somewhere 
deep inside 
> his mind he thought of Starstorm... she'd protected him, and 
inside himself 
> he remembered something... a place... peace... a land of bio-
mechanical 
> forrests and it all seemed peaceful and he was there but 
different... He 
> awoke surprised... he was in some sort of chamber... a stasis 
pod... NO! he 
> didn't want to go into a stasis pod... it took it all away... he 
didn't want 
> to lose who he was... He changed and began clawing at the walls 
frantically.
